overview: Nightmare Fuel presents - In Paris, a tourist gets kidnapped by a sadist scientist who plans to make her a test subject for his terrible experiments. Various human fears and obsessions unfold over six segments of pure madness. Welcome to the Theatre of Pain, Sin, Sexuality and Death, an experience dipped in the atmospheres of 80s gore and erotic, littered with violence, body horror and eroticism
title: Grand Guignol Madness
